Class ComponentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.generic.CrudServiceGeneric<ComponentEntity,Long>
com.app.service.impl.ComponentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentService, CrudService<ComponentEntity,Long>
@Service public class ComponentServiceImpl extends CrudServiceGeneric<ComponentEntity,Long> implements ComponentService
The ComponentServiceImpl class implements the ComponentService interface and provides functionality for managing car components. This includes saving individual components and saving multiple components at once.

The class interacts with the ComponentRepository to perform CRUD operations on component entities. It also uses a validator to ensure that the data for each component is valid before it is persisted in the database.

    • saveAll

      public List<Long> saveAll(List<CreateComponentDto> createComponentDtos)
      Saves a list of component entities based on the provided list of data transfer objects (DTOs).
      Specified by:
      saveAll in interface ComponentService
      Parameters:
      createComponentDtos - the list of data transfer objects representing components.
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly saved components.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the DTOs are invalid.
